1: <mistake>@//ma</mistake> de bzhin <mistake>du//tshog</mistake> drag lci ba can ldan no//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas <mistake>pad m'i</mistake> na bza' <mistake>dang //rdo</mistake> rje <mistake>padama'i</mistake> dbang <mistake>phyag</mistake> ma <mistake>dang//bada ma</mistake> gar gyi dbang
2: <mistake>phyag</mistake> ma <mistake>dang //sna</mistake> tshogs <mistake>pad ma</mistake> zhes bya ba pad+ma rigs kyi lha mo bzhi <mistake>yis gsungs</mistake> <mistake>so //gling</mistake> bu ma tshogs 'dus pa dang //sgo <mistake>srungs</mistake> <mistake>mtshogs</mistake> 'dus pa <mistake>ste//mtog</mistake> ma tshogs 'dus pa <mistake>yang//</mistake>
3: <mistake>pad mas</mistake> mtshan ma 'dzin par zad//dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni//ji bzhin yang dag 'byung ba'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs <mistake>te//dpal</mistake> <mistake>padma</mistake> gar gyi
4: dbang phyug gi <mistake>dkil</mistake> 'khor la sngags byung ba'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya shes pa'o//o yig <mistake>tig</mistake> le dang ldan <mistake>pas //sgra</mistake> yig i dang ldan pa'o//bden bral <mistake>phi</mistake> rol pa la <mistake>yang//byang</mistake> las bzhi pa gang
5: yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las <mistake>pzhi</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> gang yin pa//tsheg drag <mistake>a</mistake> yig sbyor bar bya//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas //sgra</mistake> yig i yis brgyan pa <mistake>ste //byang</mistake> las
6: <mistake>zhi</mistake> <mistake>ba</mistake> gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi pa gang yin pa//sgra yig u dang sbyor bar bya//de bzhin dbus las dbu ma la//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam por ldan//
7: bden bral phyi rol pa bzung <mistake>nas// sgra</mistake> yig <mistake>dang</mistake> sbyor bar bya//byang las bzhi <mistake>pha</mistake> gang yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab <mistake>macan</mistake> dang ldan//bden bral phyi rol pa bzung nas//tsheg drag mnyam <mistake>po</mistake>
8: ldan pa <mistake>yi// dbus</mistake> las tha ma pa dang ldan//de bzhin <mistake>ba den</mistake> bral phyi rol pa//sgra yig i dang <mistake>spor</mistake> bar bya//byang <mistake>la s</mistake> bzhi <mistake>bagang</mistake> yin pa//dbang ldan 'dab ma can dang ldan//dbus las bzhi
